page.title: 14Parish Council
page.content: The Parish is the most ancient type of Local Govrenment, in England it has been used for some civil purposes since the 8th century. {Salfords & Sidlow Parish Council}came into being in 1974,it is the nearest elected body to the people in the village.Elections are held every 4 years. There are{7 Parish Councillors,6 for {Salfords and 1 for Sidlow.They}seek election because they are anxious to help the community in which they live. A clerk helps councillors carry out their work. The council must hold an annual meeting and has to meet at least 3 other times in the year.Our council meets on the 1st Wednesday of every month except August.Meetings are formal occasions.The Council had the village hall built.
